## Integrated Learners

```{r echo=FALSE,results='hide'}
library(xtable)

createPackageLink = function(p) {
  if (p %nin% "stats") 
    sprintf("[%s](http://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/%s/index.html)", p, p)
  else 
    p
}

createPackagesLinks = function(ps) {
  links = sapply(ps, createPackageLink)
  collapse(links, ", ")
}

convBool = function(x) {
  ifelse(x, "X", "")
}

printCell = function(s) {
  catf("| %s ", s, newline = FALSE)
}

printHeader = function(cn) {
  s = if (cn %in% c("Id", "Name", "Short", "Note")) ":---:"  else  ":---:"
  catf("| %s", newline = FALSE, s)
}

printLine = function() {
#  catf("<tr><td colspan=12><hr></td></tr>")
}

printLearnersTab = function() {
  lrns = listLearners(create = TRUE)
  cns = c("Id", "Name", "Short", "Packages", "prob / se ", "Num.", "Fact.", "NAs", "Weights", 
    "Further", "Note")
  lapply(cns, printCell); catf("|")
  lapply(cns, printHeader); catf("|")
  old = list(type = "classif")
  for (x in lrns) {
    if (old$type != x$type)
      printLine()
    fprops = setdiff(x$properties, c("prob", "se", "numerics", "factors", "missings", "weights"))
    printCell(x$id)
    printCell(x$name)
    printCell(x$short.name)
    printCell(createPackagesLinks(x$package))
    printCell(convBool(any(hasProperties(x, c("prob", "se")))))
    printCell(convBool(hasProperties(x, "numerics")))
    printCell(convBool(hasProperties(x, "factors")))
    printCell(convBool(hasProperties(x, "missings")))
    printCell(convBool(hasProperties(x, "weights")))
    printCell(collapse(fprops))
    printCell(x$note)
    catf("|")
    old = x
  }
}
``` 

```{r echo=FALSE,results='asis'}
printLearnersTab()
```
